    • Constructor Detail

      • ExternalDataService

        public ExternalDataService()

    • Method Detail

      • decompressLoadedFiles

        public void decompressLoadedFiles()
        Decompresses the ZIP files loaded into the application. If no files are loaded no action is taken by the function.

      • loadBggData

        public void loadBggData(java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.BiosyntheticGeneCluster> bgcData)
        Constructs a BGC object per GBK file found in the folder or folders created after decompressing the ZIP file(s), passing to the constructor the File object pointing to the GBK source file. If the list contains any BGC object it will be cleared. Calls the initial data population.
        Parameters:
        bgcData - The empty or populated List of the BGC Objects.

      • populateClusterData

        private void populateClusterData(java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.BiosyntheticGeneCluster> bgcData)
        Populates six attributes per BGC: Genes data, cluster sequence, number of genes, CDS length, GC Content and Cluster Type.
        Parameters:
        bgcData - The populated List of the BGC Objects having the File attribute set to point their respective GBK file.

      • populateClusterData

        public void populateClusterData(java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.BiosyntheticGeneCluster> bgcData,
                                double gcContentRef,
                                uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.CodonUsageTable cutRef)
        Populates the GC Content Score and the Codon Usage Score for the BGC Data
        Parameters:
        bgcData - The populated List of the BGC Objects.
        gcContentRef - The GC Content of the reference species
        cutRef - The Codon Usage Table object of the reference species

      • isBgcDataInSync

        public boolean isBgcDataInSync(int bgcDataSize)
        Verifies if the number of GBK files loaded is the same as the number of BGC Objects in the Application Data BGC List.
        Parameters:
        bgcDataSize - The number of BGCs in the Application Data.
        Returns:
        true if the size is the same and different from zero, if the cluster list is empty or not in sync returns false.

      • getGenesData

        public java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.Gene> getGenesData(java.io.File file)
        Retrieves the Genes Data from a GBK cluster file. The gene data is a list of Gene Objects.
        Parameters:
        file - the File object associated the BGC
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Gene objects

      • getClusterSequence

        public java.lang.String getClusterSequence(java.io.File file)
        Retrieves the entire cluster sequence from a GBK file.
        Parameters:
        file - the File object associated the BGC
        Returns:
        A string with the nucleotide sequence in uppercase letters.

      • getClusterType

        public java.lang.String getClusterType(java.io.File file)
        Retrieves the Cluster Type from a GBK cluster file.
        Parameters:
        file - the File object associated the BGC
        Returns:
        A string containing the type or types splitted by a hyphen

      • getClusterSpecies

        public java.lang.String getClusterSpecies(java.io.File file)
        Retrieves the Cluster Species from a GBK cluster file.
        Parameters:
        file - the File object associated the BGC
        Returns:
        A string containing species associated with the BGC

      • setKnownClusterData

        public void setKnownClusterData()
        Creates the Known Cluster objects scanning all the zip files loaded into the application and triggers its population at the end of the function.

      • populateKnownClusterData

        public void populateKnownClusterData(java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.KnownCluster> knownClusterList)
        Retrieves the Known Cluster data from the knowncluster folder of each ZIP file entry loaded to the application and sets the associated data to each respective BGC object
        Parameters:
        knownClusterList - A List of KnownCluster objects that hold the Known Cluster Data of all the BGCs loaded in the application.

      • setClusterBlastData

        public void setClusterBlastData()
        Creates the Cluster Blast objects scanning all the zip files loaded into the application and triggers its population at the end of the function.

      • populateClusterBlastData

        public void populateClusterBlastData(java.util.List<uk.ac.mib.antismashoops.core.domainobject.ClusterBlast> clusterBlastList)
        Retrieves the Cluster Blast data from the clusterblast folder of each ZIP file entry loaded to the application and sets the associated data to each respective BGC object
        Parameters:
        clusterBlastList - A List of ClusterBlast objects that hold the Cluster Blast Data of all the BGCs loaded in the application.

      • delete

        public void delete(java.io.File file)
        Deletes the specified file if exists
        Parameters:
        file - the File to delete

public java.lang.String exceptionHandler(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                                                                            java.lang.Exception exception)
